sentences.en: " No. " The answer was both reticent and impersonally sad.
sentences.cn: “ 不. ” 这回答既简短,又含有一种无以名状的悲戚.

sentences.en: A misunderstood Capricorn Moon withdraws into solitude, reticent to share its feelings.
sentences.cn: 被误解时,摩羯月亮往往会选择孤独, 拒绝分享他们的情绪.

sentences.en: Aunty Henny was an outgoing but reticent person.
sentences.cn: 亨妮阿姨为人友善,但沉默寡言.

sentences.en: He seemed unduly reticent on the subject of his past.
sentences.cn: 他似乎对他过去的事情讳莫如深.

sentences.en: He was extremely reticent about his personal life.
sentences.cn: 他对自己的个人生活讳莫如深。

sentences.en: He was reticent about his opinion.
He was reticent about his past [ on family affairs ].
sentences.cn: 他对自己的过去 [ 家务事 ] 闭口不谈.

sentences.en: He was reticent, patrician, bookish, urbane.
sentences.cn: 他沉默含蓄, 雍容华贵, 书生气十足,而又温文有礼.

sentences.en: She is so reticent about her achievements.
sentences.cn: 她对自己的成就缄口不言。

sentences.en: She was morose, pale, and reticent.
sentences.cn: 她面色苍白、忧郁孤僻，并且沉默寡言。

sentences.en: So I lips reticent, but grateful that he still pens.
sentences.cn: 于是我嘴上不爱说话, 但感谢自己还有支笔.

sentences.en: The boss asked us to keep reticent on what had happened.
sentences.cn: 老板让我们对发生的事情保持沉默.

sentences.en: The English are reticent. The Englishmen are reticent.
sentences.cn: 英国人沉默寡言. 这些英国人沉默寡言.

words.tran_cn: 沉默的；有保留的；谨慎的

trans.tran_cn: 寡言少语的，有保留的，含蓄的，谨慎的
trans.tran_en: Someone who is reticent does not tell people about things
